org.chaosfisch.youtubeuploader.dao.spi

Interface CRUDDao<E>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountDao, DirectoryDao, PlaceholderDao, PlaylistDao, PresetDao, QueueDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountDaoImpl, DirectoryDaoImpl, MessageService, PlaceholderDaoImpl, PlaylistDaoImpl, PresetDaoImpl, QueueDaoImpl

    public interface CRUDDao<E>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E create(E object)
      Creates / persists a new object inside the persistence storage

      Deletes an existing object from the persistence storage

      Searches for a single object inside the persistence storage
      List<E> getAll()
      Retrieves all stored elements

      Updates an existing object inside the persistence storage
